SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: IF &$PLATFORM# EQ "WINDOWS" @echo off : ELSE : DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER : ENDIF
!------------------------------------------ Buidling java arguments -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_SV.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCE
! Define action specific java options and values : SET &ACTION_NAME# = "StartVSAction"
! Build java arguments : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_SV.PUB.INCLUDE.PREPARE_CMD ! VSE Name : SET &UC4RB_SV_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_SV_VS_ENV# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_SV.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_SV_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SV_CMD#, " -vsename &UC4RB_SV_ESCAPED_STRING#") ! Virtual Service Name : SET &UC4RB_SV_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_SV_VS_NAME# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_SV.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_SV_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SV_CMD#, " -vsname &UC4RB_SV_ESCAPED_STRING#")
: PRINT &UC4RB_SV_CMD#
! Access key is decrypted : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_SV_PASSWORD#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD : IF &$PLATFORM# EQ "UNIX" export UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD : ENDIF
! Invoking java binary &UC4RB_SV_CMD#
! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** START VIRTUAL SERVICE ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** START VIRTUAL SERVICE ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_SV.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI: :SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") :IF &STATUS# GT 0 : SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP","*message*","COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*:*') : PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : SET &SEARCHSTRING#="virtual service is already running" : SET &POS#=STR_FIND(&VALUE#,&SEARCHSTRING#) : IF &POS# NE 0 : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=0 : TERM_PROCESS : ENDIF : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# :ENDIF
